author: Jillian Vose
description: Single pot still Irish whiskey gives this Commander backbone while verjuice adds a stiff upper lip, but this Chief has heart and soul in the form of passion fruit, apricot liqueur, and Pommeau de Normandie.
name: Commander in Chief
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Single pot still Irish whiskey

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
